intro: Lampranthus explanatus, commonly known as the showy iceplant, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its vibrant, showy flowers that range in color from red to orange, often appearing in clusters. It thrives in well-drained sandy soils and is adapted to arid and semi-arid environments. Lampranthus explanatus is often cultivated for its ornamental value and ability to bloom throughout the year under suitable conditions.
